brief_title: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Patients With Non-Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
brief_summary: This 3 arm study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of adding Avastin versus placebo to a standard chemotherapeutic regimen in patients with advanced or recurrent non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) who have not received prior chemotherapy. The anticipated time of study treatment is until disease progression, and the target sample size is 500+ individuals.
